Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the validation level of a ValidationInformation structure.
        """
kwargs = {'validation_level': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The validation level must be an integer.', objects.
    ValidationInformation, **kwargs)
args = objects.ValidationInformation(), 'validation_level', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The validation level must be an integer.', setattr, *args)
